original_text: And they did so. Aaron stretched out his hand with his staff and struck the dust of the earth, and there were gnats on man and beast. All the dust of the earth became gnats in all the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 그들이 그대로 행할새 아론이 지팡이를 잡고 손을 들어 땅의 티끌을 치매 애굽 온 땅의 티끌이 다 이가 되어 사람과 가축에게 오르니

sentences.original_text: Aaron stretched out his hand with his staff
and struck the dust of the earth
and there were gnats on man and beast.
All the dust of the earth became gnats
in all the land of Egypt.
